Installation

Python Version

Please note that this project is working with python 3.8+. If you have a lower version you should upgrade your python to use this project.

Dependancies

List of dependancies

You will find all the dependancies of the project in the following table (This table does not include dependancies of dependancies):

Dependancy name

Version

Link to documentation

matplotlib

3.4.3

matplotlib

more-itertools

8.10.0

more-itertools

networkx

2.6.3

networkx

numpy

1.21.2

numpy

panda

1.3.3

panda

requests

2.26.0

requests

sphinx

4.2.0

sphinx

Install dependancies

To install all the dependancies, use the following command in the root directory of the prject:

pip install -r requirements.txt
